summary: A mod that makes horses tougher, and deal a bit more damage.
descriptionHtml:
This mod beefs up horses without making them invincible.

It changes horse levels, base health and stamina, and damage multiplier.


-Regular horse-
Level: 4 --> 15
Health: 289 --> 632
Stam: 126 --> 148
Dmg: 10 --> 20

-Frost-
Level: 25 --> 40
Health: 562 --> 957
Stam: 168 --> 198
Dmg: 10 --> 20

-Shadowmere-
Level: 50 (Unchanged)
Health: 887 --> 1087
Stam: 198 --> 218
Dmg: 10 --> 30

As well as increasing their damage it gives their attack a small chance to stagger.

INSTALL using either NMM or just by dropping the contained Data folder into your Skyrim directory.

Due to my limited modding knowledge, this mod will only immediately work on newly acquired horses. You can beef up your current horse by opening the console, clicking on your horse, and typing disable, hit <enter> and then enable, hit <enter>. Be careful before running these commands, however. I don\'t know if running these can mess with other, more complex horse mods you may happen to be using. From my experience it works fine on vanilla horses.

If you want to check your horses new stats, open the console, click on your horse, and type getavinfo health and hit <enter>. You can do this with stamina as well, as well as getlevel to check their new level.

If there is a problem with the mod, let me know and I\'ll try my best to fix it. Any suggestions or requests are also welcome.
author: GaiasDeath
